title: Comfortable 2 BD 2 BA for rent in quiet Lithonia community
posting_body: ['Walden Brook', 'RENT:', '$1753 / MONTH', 'SIZE:', '1157 - 1252 sq ft', 'BEDROOMS:', '2', 'BATHROOMS:', '2', 'LEASE TERMS:', '6-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month', 'show contact info', 'UNIT FEATURES:', '● All electric', '● Ceiling Fans', '● Dining Room', '● Dishwasher', '● Oven', '● Pantry', '● Range', '● Refrigerator/Freezer', '● Sprinkler System', '● Trash Compactor', '● Broadband access', '● Built in computer niches', "● Children's activity center", '● Contemporary floor plans', '● Large walk-in closets', '● Recreation Room', '● Spacious 1, 2 & 3 Bedrooms', '● Storage Space', '● Upgrade Unit', '● Views', "With a variety of floor plans to choose from, we're certain there's one that's just right for you.", 'Browse our one, two, and three bedroom floor plans.', 'PROPERTY FEATURES:', '● Business Center', '● Clubhouse', '● Conference Room', '● Courtyard', '● Laundry Facility', '● Maintenance on site', '● Multi Use Room', '● Playground', '● Porch', '● Resort Style Swimming Pool w/Cabana', '● Car Care Center', '● Controlled Access', '● Detached garages', '● Lake view', '● Package Service', '● Planned Social Activities', '● Property Manager on Site', '● Public Transportation', '● Sundeck', '● Wi-Fi at Pool and Clubhouse', 'PET POLICY:', 'A maximum of 2 pet per unit shall be accepted.', 'The pet fee is $300 Non-Refundable per pet.', 'A pet addendum must be completed and pet fees must be paid prior to moving in.', 'If there is more than one pet per unit, the combined weight of the 2 pets cannot exceed 50lbs.', 'VISIT OR CALL US TODAY!', '100 Walden Brook Drive', 'Lithonia, GA 30038', 'show contact info', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', 'B40AB7ED0D1B4A']
